definitions.definition: Either of two persons mentioned in the New Testament (in Mark 15:21 and Romans 16:13).
A male given name from Latin , used since the seventeenth century.
A minor city in Sherman County , Oregon , United States .

main_definition: Either of two persons mentioned in the New Testament (in Mark 15:21 and Romans 16:13).
